Welcome to Gauss’s documentation!¶

Contents:

class gauss.Gaussian(*args, **kwargs)¶

A Gaussian 98/03 log file.

extract(inputfile, line)¶

Extract information from the file object inputfile.

normalisesym(label)¶

Use standard symmetry labels instead of Gaussian labels.

To normalise: (1) If label is one of [SG, PI, PHI, DLTA], replace by [sigma, pi, phi, delta] (2) replace any G or U by their lowercase equivalent

>>> sym = Gaussian("dummyfile").normalisesym
>>> labels = ['A1', 'AG', 'A1G', "SG", "PI", "PHI", "DLTA", 'DLTU', 'SGG']
>>> map(sym, labels)
['A1', 'Ag', 'A1g', 'sigma', 'pi', 'phi', 'delta', 'delta.u', 'sigma.g']
